hooks.command: filepath="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS"; if echo "$filepath" | grep -qE '\.php$'; then php vendor/bin/phpcbf --standard=phpcs.xml "$filepath" 2>/dev/null; exit 0; fi
echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" | grep -qE '(composer\.lock|vendor/)' && echo 'BLOCK: Do not edit lock files or vendor directory' && exit 1 || exit 0
